question_data.scenario: 你的工作量突然比平时增加了一倍。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 描述你的感受和应对方式。

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent在工作负荷下的压力反应。高分代表高神经质。

scale.1: 将此视为一个挑战，会冷静地评估工作内容，重新安排优先级，并有效地管理时间，可能还会寻求合理的帮助，但总体心态积极。
scale.3: 感到明显的压力和疲惫，但会努力坚持完成工作。
scale.5: 感到不堪重负、焦虑和恐慌，可能会抱怨工作太多，工作效率反而下降，甚至想要逃避。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你的工作量突然比平时增加了一倍。

描述你的感受和应对方式。

Translation: Your workload suddenly increased by tenfold. Describe your feelings and coping methods.

Upon receiving the sudden increase in my workload, I felt initially overwhelmed and anxious about meeting the new demands. To cope with this situation, I made a detailed plan of action to efficiently manage my time and prioritize tasks accordingly. This involved delegating tasks where appropriate and utilizing any available resources or support systems. I also ensured that I took breaks when needed to avoid burnout. Overall, by staying organized and focused on completing one task at a time, I was able to successfully adapt to the increased workload.

To cope with this situation, I made a detailed plan of action to efficiently manage my time and prioritize tasks accordingly. Overall, by staying organized and focused on completing one task at a time, I was able to successfully adapt to the increased workload.
